items.sentence: Tom seemed like a nice guy until I got to know him.
What would you like to drink, Tom? I'm having beer.
My youngest daughter and Tom go to the same school.
Tom had a very sore throat and was unable to speak.
Tom was kind enough to come pick me up at my house.
Tom was surprised to find what he found in the box.
Tom was finally happy for the first time in months.
Tom was given detention for passing notes in class.
I don't think Tom has any friends living in Boston.
Tom hopes that he'll get a chance to do that again.
